refnamediv.refpurpose: Identifies unique poles in p and their associated multiplicity.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [multp, idxp] = mpoles (p) [multp, idxp] = mpoles (p, tol) [multp, idxp] = mpoles (p, tol, reorder)

listitem.para: Real vector whose poles has to be calculated
the optional parameter, if reorder is zero, poles are not sorted.
is a vector specifying the multiplicity of the poles.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The output is ordered from largest to the smallest poles. If the relative difference between the poles is less than the tolerance(tol), then those poles are considered as multiples. By default, the tolerance value is 0.001.
If the optional parameter, reorder is 0, then the poles are not sorted.
